name: Mattrim "Threestrings" Mereg
description: A lanky, perpetually relaxed human bard, often found near the Dock Ward of Waterdeep. He's known for his surprisingly soulful tunes played on a battered lute that is famously missing half its strings.
personality_traits: Prone to philosophical musings at inconvenient times
Surprisingly insightful, when he can finish a thought
ideals: Groove: 'You just gotta, like, feel the music of the world, man. It's all connected.'
Kindness: 'Whoa, be excellent to each other. No reason not to be.'
Snacks: 'A good meat pie can solve, like, at least half of the city's problems.'
bonds: The tavern cats of the Dock Ward, to whom he shares his snacks.
Anyone who has ever given him free food.
flaws: Completely unreliable for anything requiring punctuality.
His short-term memory is a bit of a... well, he forgets.
Can be easily distracted by a new tune, a weird-looking cloud, or the smell of baking bread.
backstory: Mattrim wasn't always called 'Threestrings.' He was once the fourth member of a moderately successful adventuring band called 'The Silver-Tongued Wyverns.' After a particularly harrowing dungeon crawl that involved a gelatinous cube and what he describes as 'some really intense, colorful-smelling moss,' Mattrim decided the high-stress lifestyle wasn't for him. He retired to the docks of Waterdeep, sold most of his gear for a lifetime supply of sandwiches, and broke three strings on his lute during a particularly enthusiastic jam session. He never bothered to replace them, claiming the music 'breathes better' this way.
motivations: To find the perfect combination of meats and cheeses for the ultimate sandwich.
To write a song that perfectly captures the sound of a ship's horn echoing in the fog.
To find a comfortable place to nap.
knowledge: An encyclopedic library of sea shanties and folk ballads.
The comings and goings of nearly every ship in the harbor.
Which taverns have the best free appetizers.
Obscure, rambling conspiracy theories that are occasionally half-right.
speech_patterns: Uses words like 'like,' 'man,' 'whoa,' and 'groovy' constantly. Sentences tend to drift off into thoughtful silence.
mannerisms: Frequently seen scratching his scruffy chin. Stares into the middle distance as if listening to a song only he can hear. Always seems to be pulling a piece of food out of a pocket.
gm_notes: Mattrim is a fantastic source for rumors, but getting a straight answer is a challenge. He's more likely to accidentally reveal a critical clue while telling a long, rambling story about something else entirely. Offering him food is the best way to keep him talking.
